my_toolkit.file_ops package

Submodules

my_toolkit.file_ops.file_handler module

File Operations Package

This module handles basic file read/write operations.

my_toolkit.file_ops.file_handler.read_from_file(filename: str) → str[source]

Read content from a file.

my_toolkit.file_ops.file_handler.write_to_file(filename: str, content: str) → None[source]

Write content to a file.

Module contents

Source code:

 1"""
 2File Operations Package
 3=======================
 4This module handles basic file read/write operations.
 5"""
 6
 7def write_to_file(filename: str, content: str) -> None:
 8    """Write content to a file."""
 9    with open(filename, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
10        f.write(content)
11
12def read_from_file(filename: str) -> str:
13    """Read content from a file."""
14    with open(filename, "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
15        return f.read()
